title: Video Project-Based Learning to Enhance the Role of Pharmacists in Public Health

context.prior_knowledge: Basic public health concepts and foundational knowledge in pharmacology
context.additional_context: Practical-focused course in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments emphasizing video production and internet publishing, with emphasis on professional communication skills within language domains

learning_goals: Learners can produce an educational video under three minutes explaining the role of pharmacists in public health.
Learners can write a script to systematically deliver disease prevention information to patients.
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of produced videos through peer assessment with over 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
